body_html: As a follow-up question, is it within XLA's goals to work with seq2seq models at some point? Will it be possible to use XLA on graphs that have variable length inputs and outputs? Right now, it seems that tfcompile does not like fetches with dimension -1.
body_text: As a follow-up question, is it within XLA's goals to work with seq2seq models at some point? Will it be possible to use XLA on graphs that have variable length inputs and outputs? Right now, it seems that tfcompile does not like fetches with dimension -1.
body: As a follow-up question, is it within XLA's goals to work with seq2seq models at some point? Will it be possible to use XLA on graphs that have variable length inputs and outputs? Right now, it seems that `tfcompile` does not like fetches with dimension `-1`.
